column3:
ああ気を付けた方がいいよ？

100年前僕油断しちゃってさ
ガノンが造ったそいつに やられたんだよね
column4:
Good luck! That thing is one of Ganon's own,
and it plays dirty!It defeated me 100 years ago...
but only because I was winging it.

column3:
まあ本当は言いたか無いんだけど……

僕の仇討ち頼んだよ！
column4: I can't believe I'm actually saying this...But you must avenge me, Link!
